page.title: 12Local Events around Hartwell
page.content: There is usually some village event to take part in most weeks.There are quite a few events in Hartwell.There isn't usually a fair but some times there is. This year it was a traveling fair.There are some sponsered events in Hartwell and Ashton.Hartwell has a lot of things compared to other villages.The school organises swimming lessons for pupils. Hartwell can be very boring for children.The schools organise a May fair,Christmas bazaar & auctions,Treasure hunts & barn dances. The Playing Fields Association run a Summer Fete and six-a-side football tournament every year to raise money for new changing rooms.Charities that are supported include Cancer Research, Famine Appeals and Help the Aged. Tanya Robson,10 & Julie Harris,11.
